tool_description: National Registered Sex Offenders API for the United States. 750k+ offender records, 1M+ crimes, 19k+ cities, and all 50 states. Supports both criteria-based search (name, nicknames [e.g. Jon vs Jonathan], city, zip, state) and geospatial search (lat/lng, radius). More info https://offenders.io/
name: Sex Offenders
title: Sex Offenders

api_list.name: Search Sex Offenders
